author: hsiaowei
content: Sorry about the delay. I think early-mid next week so that we can include more Capella updates+tests. Is it blocking eip-4844 interop due to PR#3145?. If it's urgent, I can make another hotfix with #3145 this weekend.

content: It's not blocking! Next week is good. Just curious about timeline. Thank you!
